author: Fox News Insider
title: Ayaan Hirsi Ali Islamic Terrorists Don't Say Thank You for Being Politically Correct on Religion
text:
7 P 
Fox News Channel has powerful coverage of the U.K. Parliament terror attack. Watch Shepard Smith anchor LIVE from the Fox News Deck at 7:00 p.m. ET, followed by more must-see reporting on The O'Reilly Factor , Tucker Carlson Tonight and Hannity . The First 100 Days Mom Demands Answers After 2 Illegal Immigrants Arrested in Rape of Girl at MD School Mar 21, 2017 8:09pm A mother of a Maryland student who attends the school that was the site of an alleged rape of a 14-year-old by two illegal immigrants spoke out about the incident on "The First 100 Days". GOP Rep: Media Missed Key Comey Testimony on Illegal Gov't Leaks Mar 20, 2017 7:37pm Congressman Peter King (R-New York) said the mainstream media neglected to report key points made by the FBI director at Monday's hearing before his committee. Wallace: I Was Struck by What Trump & Merkel Didn't Talk About Mar 17, 2017 8:30pm President Trump and German Chancellor Angela Merkel held a meeting at the Oval Office on Friday, followed by a joint press conference minutes later.
